english.segment1: Wonderful Savior. My heart belongs to Thee. I will remember always. The blood You shed for me. Wonderful Savior. My heart will know Your worth. So I will embrace You always. As I walk this earth
english.segment2: (chorus). Be blessed, be loved, be lifted high. Be treasured here, be glorified. I owe my life to You oh Lord. Here I am
english.segment3: Beautiful Jesus. How may I bless Your heart?. Knees to the earth. I bow down to everything You are. Beautiful Jesus. You are my only worth. So I will embrace You always. As I walk this earth
